TITLE: Depends on the paper...
TEXT: So I saw these highlighters and I was like God damn, gotta get me some of those (how sad, I treat myself with highlighters for work). I didn't read reviews  I thought they were a good brand and therfore my order was placed and I was going to receive these gorgeous pastel highlighters! Anyway, they turned up fast as I have prime and they are cute. The good thing is that these aren't going to run out on you anytime soon, they are very wet and glide along the paper nicely. The only problem is that they are anti dry out ones so they are always wet and you can leave the lids off, this means when you use them there is a lot of ink coming out, and I mean a lot. This also means that if you are using crappy thin paper that it's just going to go straight through to the other side. I have attached photos to show them on thick paper (nice and neat) and on the paper I use to print on and it's a bit patchy. I have also attached a photo of the back of paper which shows them going though to the other side. Once it dries out it leaves my pages a bit bumpy from where it has expanded with the liquid. Moral of the story, don't impulse buy cute things (I am a female and will never learn this lesson) and make sure you read reviews. Other than that quite a decent set, but for the price, maybe I will settle for Poundland ones next time...
